TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Kanadun, title = Kanadun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kanadun} }

S.FORM: == Kanadun == u sulit nu Hulam: 金崙部落 i Taitung a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Kanadun. u kasalumaluma' nu Kanadun sa, 611 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 1,469 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 1,211 ku tademaw, pakalatu 82%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 258 ku tademaw, pakalatu 18%. u kasabinacadan, 與大武窟部落混居. u Sakizaya a tademaw i Taitung a kuwan, caay katuud ku Sakizaya. inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw itini mueneng. izaw tu hakya, caayhenay pasumad tu ngangan nu cidekay. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 10 a bulad

== Kanadon == o solit no Holam: 金崙部落 i Taitong a kowan ko niyazo' no Kanadon. o kasalomaloma' no Kanadon sa, 611 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 1,469 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 1,211 ko tademaw, pakalato 82%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 258 ko tademaw, pakalato 18%. o kasabinacadan, 與大武窟部落混居. o Sakizaya a tademaw i Taitong a kowan, caay katood ko Sakizaya. inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw itini moeneng. izaw to hakya, caayhenay pasomad to ngangan no cidekay. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 10 a bolad
